events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product does not meet my expectations.
System flagged the case as Refund based on keywords such as refund and request related to order issues.
The ticket has been assigned to agent Lisa M. who specializes in refund requests for further handling.
Hello! I’m Lisa, and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today. I’m here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing that I received a completely different product than what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a prepaid label for you to return the incorrect item.
I appreciate your quick response and the refund offer. I will send back the item today using the label once I receive it.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
We’re following up to ensure your refund was received and to see if there’s anything else we can help you with.
Since you confirmed the refund was received, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
